features.name: Gantt Chart Pro
features.description: Professional Gantt chart with zoom (50%-300%), dependency arrows, drag/drop tasks, resize tasks, tooltip with dependencies, modal with full task details including predecessors and successors

features.name: Task Detail Modal
features.description: Modal showing full task details including dependencies (predecessors), blockers (successors), status, priority, description, notes. Calculates dependencies dynamically from depends_on field

features.name: Kanban Board
features.description: Drag and drop Kanban board with task status updates, shows blocker count calculated from depends_on field

features.name: Workflow Dashboard
features.description: Dashboard showing workflow with task dependencies, calculates blocker count from depends_on field

features.name: GAP Dashboard
features.description: Dashboard showing gap analysis with next tasks ready to execute (no blocking dependencies)

features.name: Master Map
features.description: Network visualization of all tasks and dependencies

features.name: Timeline View
features.description: Chronological timeline view of tasks and milestones

features.name: Activity Logs
features.description: Real-time activity feed showing task updates

features.name: Setup Wizard
features.description: Onboarding wizard for initial project setup
